title: RIOT PLEASE HELP ME!!!!!
body: HI THERE , I LOSE MY EMAIL, WHAT CAN I DO, HOW CAN I RESET IT TO BE A NEW ONE.

replies.body: Hit up our account agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). if you can verify yourself as the account creator those agents should be able to help you gets this figured out!
DO U KNOW WHAT SHOULD I DO?
